snippet: Residents of Shenzhen, the mainland city just across the border, will be allowed just one trip per week, the ministry that issues visas has announced.

byline.original: By CHRIS BUCKLEY and ALAN WONG

lead_paragraph: Residents of Shenzhen, the mainland city just across the border, will be allowed just one trip per week, the ministry that issues visas has announced.

headline.main: China Limits Neighbors’ Visits to Hong Kong After Smuggling Complaints
headline.print_headline: China Limits Neighbors’ Visits to Hong Kong After Smuggling Complaints

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China
